title: Women Breakfast Meeting 2025
excerpt: A monthly workshop series exploring core family values and their practical application in daily life.
content:
# Women Family Breakfast ‚Äì WOFAB 2025
**Mobilize: Educate: Inspire**  

---

## Date  
**16th September 2025** (International Peace Day)  

## Location  
**The Heron Hotel**, Jakaya Kikwete Road, Nairobi  

## Time  
**8:00 AM ‚Äì 12:00 AM**  

---

## Overview  
Join us for the **Women Family Breakfast**, an inspiring gathering highlighting the vital role of women and families in building lasting peace through compassion, education, and intergenerational values.  

Organized by **Family Peace Association, Kenya** in partnership with women leaders, this event aims to celebrate, discuss, and promote women's roles in creating **thriving, great, and peaceful families**.  

---

## What to Expect  
- Engaging discussions with women leaders, activists, and stakeholders  
- Strategic planning for **Women Outreach & Family Peace Education Initiatives**  
- Networking opportunities with like-minded individuals  
- Inspiration to lead with compassion, service, and reconciliation in families  

---

## Registration  
**Ksh. 2000/- per person**  
[Click here to register](https://forms.gle/HT9jg73hPrynaWLu7)  

---

## Contact & More Information  
üìû **0728862077 / 0721971194**  
üìß **Kenya@familypeace.org**  
üåê [www.familypeace.org](http://www.familypeace.org)  

---

## Organized by  
**Family Peace Association Kenya ‚Äì Ushirika Wa Familia**  

---

## Key Partners  
- **Global Peace Women**  
- **Global Peace Foundation Kenya**
---

title: Annual Family Peace Conference 2025
excerpt: Join us for our annual conference focusing on building stronger God-centered families and communities.
content:
# Annual Family Peace Conference 2025

Join us for an inspiring weekend of fellowship, learning, and spiritual growth at our Annual Family Peace Conference.

## Event Details
- **Date:** August 15-17, 2025
- **Location:** Family Peace Center, Nairobi
- **Time:** 9:00 AM - 5:00 PM daily

## What to Expect
- Keynote speakers from around the world
- Interactive workshops on family values
- Youth activities and programs
- Community building sessions
- Spiritual development workshops

## Registration
Early bird registration is now open! Register before July 31st to get a special discount.

## Contact
For more information, please contact us at events@familypeaceassociation.org
